main event: A T/Sgt and his son observed an unidentified flying object while fishing at Point Lookout, Long Island, New York on October 5, 1960.
interesting points: The object was first seen moving high in the sky from northeast to southwest,The object made a wide turn and appeared almost stationary during the turn,It emitted a bright continuous white light with no noise,The sighting lasted approximately 10 minutes,The only other witness was the sergeant's son, who was present during the observation.
location: Point Lookout, Long Island, New York, USA
